hero.title_start: Your Farm in the palm of
hero.description: GanIA: The first <1>Digital Steward</1> that transforms data into profitability. Designed to work offline in deep rural areas.

banner.text: No Internet, no problem. GanIA works 100% offline-first in the field.

services.s1_desc: Optimize meat and dairy production simultaneously with genealogy and animal health reports.
services.s2_desc: Dynamic maps of your land. Know when to rotate cattle or fertilize based on lot history.
services.s3_desc: No more guesswork. GanIA automatically calculates the cost per liter of milk or kilo of meat produced.

modules.subtitle: App Architecture
modules.m1_desc: Total traceability for dual-purpose farms. Weight control, reproductive cycles, and automated health.
modules.m2_desc: Satellite crop mapping. Occupancy tracking, planting planning, and estimated harvest calculation.
modules.m3_desc: Real financial control. Know the exact ROI for each animal or crop lot.
modules.m4_desc: Smart synchronization. The app works in the pasture without signal and updates when you get home.

vision.subtitle: Computer Vision
vision.step1_desc: Take a photo of the affected leaf or animal.
vision.step2_desc: GanIA processes the image looking for pest patterns or deficiencies.
vision.step3_desc: Receive an immediate recommendation and save the report to your history.

dashboard.title: Total Control in Real Time
dashboard.description: Visualize your investment performance with intuitive charts and reports automatically generated by our IA.

caribe.description: From small farms to large operations, GanIA understands your language, your environment, and your daily challenges.

footer.slogan: Transforming the agricultural sector through technological innovation and artificial intelligence.
footer.newsletter_desc: Get expert advice and innovation for your field.
